comments.content:
I would proudly present my neighborhood area "Shifen old street"
It's one of the top 30 POIs in Taiwan.
The main attraction beeing the release of sky lanterns. You can buy a paper lantern, write your wishes on four sides, and then some of the staff will help you release it and take a picture for you.
If it rise into the sky successfully, that's mean your wishes will come true in future. it's a very special tradition, you can see many lanterns in the sky, really beautiful and interesting.
You can also buy some special souvenirs from local souvenir shops.
Have you ever been to there?
nice... never had a paper lantern to write my wish on. gotta go there and try. thank you for your sharing
